text.top: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each face-down card in this line.

text.middle: Flip all other face-up cards in this line.

text.top: Ignore all middle commands of cards in this line.
text.bottom: **When this card would be covered:** First, flip this card.

text.middle: Flip 1 of your opponent's face-up cards.
You may flip 1 of your face-up covered cards.
You discard 1 card.
Put 1 of your opponent's covered or uncovered face-down cards into your hand.
Discard 1 card. Refresh.
text.bottom: **After a player refreshes:** Draw the top card of your opponent's deck. Discard 1 card into their trash.
**End:** Play the top card of your opponent's deck face down in this stack.

text.middle: Draw the top card of your opponent's deck. Your opponent draws the top card of your deck.
You discard 1 card.

text.bottom: **End:** Play the top card of your deck face-down on your opponent's side.

text.middle: In each line, flip 1 covered card.
text.bottom: **Start:** Draw the top card of your opponent's deck. Your opponent draws the top card of your deck.

text.middle: Rearrange your protocols. Rearrange your opponent's protocols.
Shift 1 of your covered cards.

text.bottom: This card may be played without matching protocols.
**End:** Discard your hand. Draw that many cards.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.

text.top: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each card in your hand.
**Start:** Reveal the top card of your deck. You may discard the top card of your deck.
text.middle: Your opponent reveals their hand.
text.bottom: **When this card would be covered:** First, draw 3 cards.

text.middle: Reveal your deck. Draw 1 card with a value of 1 revealed this way. Shuffle your deck. Play 1 card with a value of 1.
Reveal your deck. Draw 1 card with a value of 5 revealed this way. Shuffle your deck.
You may shuffle your trash into your deck.
You discard 1 card.

text.top: **Start:** Flip 1 face-up covered or uncovered card in this stack other than this card.
text.bottom: You may play this card in any line on either player's side.

text.middle: Return 1 card.
text.bottom: **When a card would be returned to your opponent's hand:** Put that card on top of their deck face-down instead.

text.top: **After you discard cards:** Your opponent discards 1 card.
text.middle: Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card.
You may flip 1 face-up covered card.
You discard 1 card.

text.top: **End:** Either discard 1 card or delete this card.
**Start:** If you have no cards in hand, draw 1 card.
text.middle: Draw 1 card.
text.bottom: **End:** You may discard 1 card. If you do, your opponent discards 1 card.

text.middle: Delete 1 of your opponent's cards in a line where they have a highter total value than you do
Draw 1 card.
text.bottom: **End:** If your opponent has a highter total value than you do in this line, draw 1 card.
**End:** You may shift this card to the line where your opponent has their highest total value.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.

text.top: **End:** If your opponent has a higher value in this line than you do, flip this card.

text.middle: Draw 3 cards. Shift 1 of your opponent's covered cards.
Flip 1 of your opponent's cards. You may shift that card.

text.top: All face-down cards in this stack have a value of 4.
text.middle: You may flip 1 covered card in this line.
Play 1 card face-down in another line.
Shift 1 face-down card.
You discard 1 card.
Delete 1 card from each other line.

text.top: **Start:** You may draw 1 card. If you do, delete 1 other card. Then delete this card.

text.middle: Delete all cards in 1 line with values of 1 or 2.
Delete 1 face-down card.
Delete a card with a value of 0 or 1.
You discard 1 card.
If there are 6 different protocols on cards in the field, flip the Diversity protocol to the compiled side.
text.bottom: **End:** You may play 1 non-Diversity card in this line.

text.middle: Shift 1 card. Draw cards equal to the number of different protocols in this line.

text.top: Your total value in this line is increased by 2 if there are any non-Diversity face-up cards in this stack.

text.middle: Flip 1 card with a value less than the number of different protocols on cards in the field.
You discard 1 card.

text.top: **End:** If there are not at least 3 different protocols on cards in the field, delete this card.
During your turn, your opponent's cards do not have middle commands.
text.middle: Shift or flip 1 card.
Draw 2 cards. Your opponent discards their hand and draws the amount of cards discarded minus 1.
Return 1 of your opponent's cards.
Shift 1 of your opponent's covered or uncovered cards in this line.
Your opponent discards 1 random card.
You discard 1 card.
Flip 1 other card. Draw 2 cards.
text.bottom: **When this card would be covered:** First, draw 1 card.Then, flip 1 other card.

text.middle: Discard 1 card. If you do, delete 1 card.
Discard 1 card. If you do, return 1 card.

text.bottom: **End:** You may discard 1 card. If you do, flip 1 card.

text.middle: Discard 1 or more cards. Draw the amount discarded plus 1.
You discard 1 card.
For every 2 cards in this line, play the top card of your deck face-down under this card.
Draw 2 cards. Shift 1 card either to or from this line.
Flip 1 card. Shift that card to this line.
Shift 1 face-down card to this line.
You discard 1 card.
Your opponent plays the top card of their deck face-down in this line.
Delete 1 card.
Discard 3 cards. Delete 1 card. Delete 1 card.
Delete your highest value uncovered card. Delete your opponent's highest value uncovered card.

text.top: **After you delete cards:** Draw 1 card.

text.bottom: **When this card would be covered:** First, delete the lowest value covered card in this line.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.
You may shift this card.
text.bottom: **After your opponent plays a card in this line:** Your opponent discards 1 card.

text.middle: Shift 1 other card.

text.top: **End:** If this card is covered, you may shift it.

text.bottom: This card cannot be flipped.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.

text.top: If you have any cards in your hand, you cannot draw cards.
**End:** If this card is covered, delete this card.
text.middle: Play the top card of your deck face-down in each line where you have a card.
Flip 1 card. Flip 1 card.
Draw 1 card. You may flip 1 face-down card.

text.bottom: **When this card would be covered:** First, play the top card of your deck face-down in another line.

text.middle: If this card is covering a card, draw 1 card.
You discard 1 card.
Flip 1 card. Draw cards equal to that card's value.

text.bottom: **End:** Draw 1 card.

text.middle: Draw 2 cards. Reveal 1 face-down card. You may shift or flip that card.
Shift all face-down cards in this line to another line.
Your opponent reveals their hand.
You discard 1 card.
Draw the top card of your opponent's deck.
text.bottom: **End:** You may give 1 card from your hand to your opponent. If you do, draw 2 cards.

text.middle: Your opponent draws 1 card. Refresh.
Take 1 random card from your opponent's hand. Give 1 card from your hand to your opponent.
Reveal 1 card from your hand. Flip 1 card.
You discard 1 card.
Your opponent draws 2 cards.
State a number. Draw 3 cards. Reveal 1 card drawn with the face-up value of your stated number. You may play it.
Play the top card of your deck face-down. Flip that card, ignoring its middle commands.
Discard the top card of your deck. Draw cards equal to the value of the discarded card.
State a protocol. Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. If the discarded card matches the stated protocol, delete 1 card.
Discard the top card of your deck. Delete 1 covered or uncovered card that shares a value with the discarded card.
You discard 1 card.

text.top: Your opponent's total value in this line is reduced by 2.
text.middle: Flip 1 card.
Draw 2 cards. Your opponent cannot compile on their next turn.

text.top: Your opponent cannot play cards face-down in this line.

text.middle: Draw 1 card. Delete all cards in 1 other line with 8 or more cards.
You discard 1 card.

text.top: **When this card would be covered or flipped:** First, delete this card.
Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each of your opponent's cards in this line.

text.bottom: **End:** You may resolve the middle command of 1 of your opponent's cards as if it were on this card.

text.middle: Swap all of your cards in one of your stacks with another one of your stacks.
Flip 1 of your cards. Flip 1 of your opponent's cards in the same line.

text.bottom: **After your opponent draws cards:** Draw 1 card.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.
Both players discard their hand.
text.bottom: **End:** If your hand is empty, draw 1 card.

text.middle: Draw 1 card. Play 1 card face-down.
You may discard 1 card. Flip 1 card thas has a value greater than the number of cards in your hand.

text.bottom: **After you discard cards during your opponent's turn:** Draw 1 card.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.
If you have more then 1 card in your hand, flip this card
Your opponent discards 1 card.
text.bottom: Your opponent cannot play cards in this line.

text.top: **After your opponent discards cards:** Draw 1 card.
text.middle: Your opponent discards 1 card.
Dicard 1 or more cards. Your opponent discards the amount of cards discarded plus 1.
Flip each other face-up card.

text.bottom: **End:** Your opponent deletes 1 of their face-down cards. You may flip this card.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.
Draw 2 cards. Your opponent discards 2 cards, then reveals their hand.

text.top: Your opponent can only play cards face-down.
text.bottom: **Start:** Flip this card.

text.middle: Your opponent discards 2 cards. Rearrange their protocols.
Your opponent discards 1 card. Shift 1 of their cards.

text.bottom: **End:** You may return 1 of your opponent's cards. If you do, flip this card.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.
Play the top card of your deck face-down in each line with a face-down card.
Flip 1 of your cards. You may shift that card.

text.top: Your total value in this line is increased by 1 for each face-down card in this line.

text.middle: Play 1 card face-down in a line with a face-down card.
Shift 1 covered face-down card.
You discard 1 card.
Play 1 card.

text.top: **After you clear cache:** Draw 1 card.
text.middle: Draw 2 cards.

text.top: **When this card would be deleted by compiling:** Shift this card, even if this card is covered.

text.middle: Shift 1 of your other cards.
text.bottom: **End:** You may shift 1 of your cards. If you do, flip this card.

text.middle: Shift 1 of your opponent's face-down cards.
You discard 1 card.
Refresh. Draw 1 card.
text.bottom: Skip your check cache phase.

text.top: When you play cards face-up, they may be played without matching protocols.
text.middle: Draw 2 cards.
text.bottom: **Start:** Either discard 1 card or flip this card.

text.middle: You may flip 1 card.

text.top: **After you draw cards:** You may shift this card, even if this card is covered.

text.middle: Swap the positions of 2 of your protocols
You discard 1 card.
Play 1 card from your trash. Shuffle your trash into your deck.
Flip 1 covered card. Discard your entire deck.

text.top: **After you shuffle your deck:** Draw 1 card and you may shift this card.
text.middle: If there are any cards in your trash, you may shuffle your trash into your deck.
Reveal 1 card from your trash. Play it face-down in another line.
Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.
You discard 1 card.
If there is another Unity card in the field, either flip 1 card or draw 1 card.
text.bottom: **When this card would be covered by a Unity card:** First, either flip 1 card or draw 1 card.

text.top: **Start:** If this card is covered, you may shift this card.
text.middle: If there are 5 or more Unity cards in the field, flip the Unity protocol to the compiled side and delete all cards in that line.
text.bottom: Unity cards may be played face-up in this line.

text.middle: Draw cards equal to the number of Unity cards in the field.
If there is another Unity card in the field, you may flip 1 face-up card.

text.top: **Start:** If you hand is empty, reveal your deck, draw all Unity cards from it, and shuffle your deck.

text.middle: You discard 1 card.

text.top: **After you refresh:** You may flip this card.
text.bottom: **After your opponent draws cards:** You may delete 1 card.
**After your opponent refreshes:** Discard any number of cards. Refresh.

text.middle: Flip 1 card.
text.bottom: **After your opponent compiles:** Your opponent discards their hand.

text.middle: Draw 1 card.
text.bottom: **After your opponent discards cards:** You may play 1 card face-down.

text.middle: Your opponent discards 1 card.
You discard 1 card.
Flip 1 other card. Flip this card.
Play the top card of your deck face-down in each other line.
Draw 2 cards. Rearrange your protocols.
Return all cards with a value of 2 in 1 line.
Return 1 of your cards.
You discard 1 card.
